sentences: Chair Thorgeirsson reported on intersessional consultations, noting agreement that the next steps should include strengthening web-based approaches for exchanging information and further work on developing and sharing self-evaluations of P&Ms.
A contact group co-chaired by Peer Stiansen (Norway) and Suk-Hoon Woo (Republic of Korea) was convened.
enb_long_title: Eighth Conference of the Parties to the UN Framework Convention on Climate Change
